question: Show me salads and soups served at the Hilton.
sql_query1:
SELECT Salads.name
FROM Salads
WHERE Salads.BuffetName = "Hilton"
UNION
SELECT Soups.name
FROM Soups
WHERE Soups.BuffetName = "Hilton"
sql_query2:
SELECT Salads.name
FROM Salads
UNION
SELECT Soups.name
FROM Soups
WHERE Soups.BuffetName = "Hilton"
interpretation1: What salads are served at the Hilton and what soups are served at the same buffet?
interpretation2: List all salads and also list soups served at the Hilton buffet.
